data.name: Business Overdraft
data.description: Provides cash flow relief with funds to cover business expenses, such as invoices and wages until you?re paid.

features.additionalInfo: No minimum or maximum amount (credit criteria apply)
Variable interest rate (fixed rate not available)

features.additionalValue: Easily manage and access your business overdraft via Online, Telephone, Mobile or Tablet Banking and via our ATM network.

features.additionalInfo: Temporary Overdraft is available for customers.Temporary Overdraft is a one-off short term working capital facility for existing business customers, with or without an existing overdraft agreement. Requests for new customers may be approved by a Credit Officer on an exception basis

eligibility.additionalInfo: Business must be registered in Australia

A business entity domiciled in Australia or an individual 18 years and above or strata corporation domiciled in Australia and requires the funding for business or investment purposes other than investment in residential property
Credit history: All borrowers, owners, directors and guarantors must have clear credit records. All statutory payments and ATO liabilities need to be up to date and not under arrangement
Banking and borrowing history: Existing bank accounts and lending products must be within their approved limits
Finance is only to be used for business purposes and will not be used to finance other lending, start a business, fund a property development or purchase residential property

Security: Depending on the circumstances, business loans can be unsecured or require security in the form of residential, commercial or rural property.  A guarantee will also be required by company directors for corporate borrowers
